Description:
Sensational New Style with Quality & Finesse!
Meticulously detailed & beautifully appointed, this just-completed 3 bedroom home presents a
brilliant new lifestyle opportunity with its intelligent single-level floorplan & first-class features throughout - all perfectly positioned in one of Craigieburn's favourite new neighbourhoods.
Vogue interior showcases a wide central hallway, master bedroom with large walk-in robe & deluxe ensuite (double vanity & double shower), 2 additional bedrooms (both with built-in robes) & equally-stylish main bathroom. Add to this a family-sized laundry with ample storage cupboards, gourmet kitchen with tiled splashbacks, breakfast bar & high-end Technika appliances, as well as a wonderfully spacious open-plan living/dining area leading out to a back garden.
What really sets this home apart is its long list of premium inclusions such as stone benchtops throughout (including the laundry), soft-close cabinetry with ultra-glaze finishes throughout, high ceilings with LED downlights throughout, plus ducted heating & evaporative cooling, video intercom, internally-accessed garage (remote-control) & additional driveway parking.
Close proximity to Craigieburn's growing array of primary & secondary schools, popular parks & shopping centres (via Grand Boulevard) along with easy access to Mickleham Road & the
Hume Freeway.
Insights: 13 Angophora Crescent, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
IMMACULATE FAMILY HOME WITH 3 SEPARATE LIVING ZONES
This beautifully presented home offers floorplan versatility & first-class features highlight the allure of this sensational family home providing absolute quality & style in one of Craigieburn's most aspirational neighbourhoods.
Cleverly zoned for large scale gatherings, the home comprises of 4 large bedrooms all with walk-in robes, 2 bathrooms & separate toilet downstairs, kids retreat upstairs, separate formal lounge room/optional 5th bedroom & a fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances, dishwasher & walk-in pantry overlooking a spacious meals area & family room along with a sensational balcony from the upstairs master hosting amazing views of Anzac Park where fire-work displays from time-to-time will be enjoyed by your family.
Outside, a fabulous enclosed alfresco entertaining area & wonderfully private backyard garden offering low-maintenance ease. Surrounded by other homes of quality & class, it also offers great exposure for a home business, easy access to Craigieburn's best facilities including Craigieburn Central Shopping Precinct, Schools, Splash Aquatic Centre, Medical Services, parks & trails, public transport & so much more!
Expect all the modern features which include a remote garage, high ceilings, alarm with video intercom, evaporative cooling through-out & a separate split system downstairs. Come inside and appreciate the amazing size of the home and all it has to offer!
Insights: 14 Marathon Boulevard, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Warm Welcoming Home in Finest Location
This much loved quality built 4-bedroom family home is immaculately presented and has everything you desired for in a coveted location. An ideal family home for a lucky buyer looking for space and quality in a family friendly location, featuring the finest details of everyday living. The neutral colour scheme complements porcelain tiles and quality carpets to enhance the overall appeal of the interiors. The four-bedroom accommodation comprises an exquisite master suite with walk in robes and luxury ensuite. A family bathroom of equal quality and style serves the remaining bedrooms with ease.
Modern kitchen is a delight with its careful blending of upmarket appliances and equipment, including 900 m/m oven, stone bench tops, walk in pantry to entice a MasterChef within you overlooking family and meals area. Step outside to alfresco arena delivering the perfect oasis for boisterous family fun or private relaxation. Blessed with an abundance of further features which include the comfort of remote operated double garage with internal access, high ceilings throughout, National Broadband Network (NBN), quality furnishings, evaporative cooling, ducted heating etc. and much more.
Only a short stroll to bus stops, Hume tennis court, Aitken creek primary, Hume library, Splash aquatic centre, Craigieburn central shopping and a short drive to Hume Anglican Grammar, Craigieburn Station and very easy access to Hume freeway. This gorgeous home warrants your inspection!
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.

Description:
The perfect start
Situated in the ever so popular Highlands pocket sits this neat 4 bedroom home that is sure to impress growing families, first home buyers and investors.
Offering a free flowing floorplan with plenty of space and light the home comprises a master bedroom with WIR and en-suite, 3 generous bedrooms & a central family bathroom. Open plan living/dining area & a well appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry. Evaporative cooling, ducted heating, remote control single garage with internal access, freshly painted and landscaped gardens are just some of the great additional features included.
In an ideal location close to schools, childcares, parklands, walking tracks and a short drive to Craigieburn Central & Highlands shopping centers.

Description:
Brand New Living for all to Enjoy
If you are looking for a beautiful home that offers something a little different then you'll certainly find it in this newly built Glenvill home.
Designed to complement family living whilst providing maximum flexibility, this home features a private master suite with ensuite & walk-in-robe located at the rear of the home & 3 other bedrooms. The centrally located kitchen has a large pantry & mirrored splashback that looks out to the spacious open plan living area & there is the added bonus of a separate living room to the front of the home. You will certainly have plenty of room to grow.
Loaded with quality extras including a double remote garage with internal access, 900mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher & stone bench tops, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, LED down lights to entry & living areas, letterbox, clothesline & professionally landscaped gardens all around including an alfresco on a great family sized allotment measuring 400m2.
This amazing package is well located opposite parkland in this popular estate & only a short drive to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre & with schools, bus stop, Hume tennis centre & Childcare only a short walk away. Don't miss out on this sensational offering, call today!
Insights: 6 Caspian Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
The Perfect Start
Immediately enjoy what's on offer, located in Craigieburn's finest Highlands Estate, surrounded by picturesque parkland, walking distance to schools, childcare ,hockey stadium and just a short drive to Craigieburn Plaza.
Fantastic opportunity for first homebuyers, downsizers or astute investors. This beautiful home comprising of 3 bedrooms, master with an ensuite and W.I.R's,the other two with built in robes, modern open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops and dishwasher is certainly a show piece of this fabulous home as it overlooks the meals and living area. Other quality features include decent sized garage, polished timber floors, high ceilings, window furnishings and low maintenance backyard with a pergola and garden space.
OPPORTUNITY NOT TO BE MISSED!!!
Homes like this do not come up often, so call now to book an appointment.

Description:
Great Home in a Great Location!
Located right in the heart of Craigieburn within walking distance to public transport, local shops and schools. This three bedroom house is ideal for first home buyers or investors.
Featuring separate entrance, formal lounge and dining, good size kitchen with ample cupboard space overlooking family area with an access to a low maintenance backyard, 3 bedrooms (all with BIR's), central bathroom, 2 toilets, carport with drive through access to accommodate more cars.
Fixtures and fittings: ducted heating, reverse cycle split system, kitchen appliances, shed, vertical blinds, and much more!

Description:
Proudly Presented With Location To Match...
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all. Just some of the comforts on hand include master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, well-appointed kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher over looking the meals/family room, formal lounge and more. Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight surrounded by low maintenance gardens, under cover alfresco area, a double lock up garage with internal access, ducted heating and split system cooling makes this the complete package. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates amongst quality homes & parkland, with all the amenities close by including schools, shopping centres, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
Hidden Gem in Hyde Park
Centrally located with access to all Craigieburn facilities, Ring Road and Hume Highway. Easy access to both Highlands Shopping Centre & Craigieburn Central. Located very close to primary and secondary local schools and transport within a minutes walk.
This 4-bedroom home is a perfect purchase for a first home buyer or investor. A low maintenance property with a covered entertaining area and a well thought out use of space and design. Large master with ensuite and walk-in robe, 3 additional generous sized rooms with built in robes.
Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, oven, gas cooktop and dishwasher. Drive through double garage with remote entry and access to huge undercover entertaining area. This beautiful home will not last long.
Sealed Bid: Monday 22nd July 2019 at 7.00pm
(unless sold prior)

Description:
Ready To Move In, 36Sq's (Approx.) Home With City Views
On arrival, landscaped gardens welcome you to this fully rendered impeccable 5-bedroom double story home nestled in a prime sought-after location. The upcoming school is located within walking distance.
With a stylish entry, you will walk into the opulent ground floor master suite with its huge dressing room style walk-in robe area, and a lavish grand en-suite.
You will feel spoiled with the spacious living areas downstairs and fabulous comfort upstairs.
Designer dream kitchen with an ample size walk in pantry, open plan living and dining with room for everyone to enjoy. The addition of an outdoor area offers, even more space for entertaining family and friend.
If you're a lover of interior space and prestige, then this home is going to thrill you.
Upstairs features, your own private sanctuary with the massive leisure / theatre room and your four spacious bedrooms, 3 of which feature built-in-robes and front room with walk in robe.
Luxurious inclusions in the home include, stone bench top, down lights, heating and evaporative cooling, 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and microwave included.
This beautiful home shines with high quality tile flooring and carpets throughout the house.
If you are looking for a Double Storey home, that will offer the entire family a great lifestyle option, then this home is waiting for you to see it and grab it.
Don't Miss out !
Features: Study, Walk in Pantry, Master Bed at front of Ground Floor, Powder Room, Double garage, 2 Linen closets, Leisure room upstairs, Designer inclusions, Blinds and much more...
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers -
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Elevated Style with Every Mt Aitken Advantage!
A value-packed modern lifestyle high on Mt Aitken, this double-storey home delivers a high-
quality low-maintenance environment with its light-filled interior, quality features throughout & outstanding urban convenience.
Absolutely immaculate from start to finish, the home's as-new interior comprises 2 bedrooms
(large master) both with built-in robes, stylish central bathroom with stone-top vanity & guest powder room (second WC). Add to this versatile open-plan living & dining areas enhanced by a sleek stone-bench kitchen complete with tiled splashbacks, stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher.
Other highlights include split-system heating & cooling (both levels), discreet laundry facilities & under-stair storage, NBN connection, plus a north-facing courtyard & secure
carport with remote-controlled rollerdoor. Walking distance to Mt Aitken Primary School & easy access to the best of Craigieburn including a choice of shopping centres, sports facilities, endless trails & acres of parkland, as well as public transport & major arterial roads.
* Auction held at Highgate Recreation Reserve- 229 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn

Description:
Home sweet home
Located in Craigieburn's highly sought-after Malcom Creek Estate is this outstanding modern home with everything you could possibly need.
The light-filled interior boasts of 4 generous size bedrooms all featuring WIRS and 2 master suites. A luxurious central bathroom with double shower, large functional laundry and an elegant powder room. Also fitted with A large open study or potential formal living zone.
The gourmet kitchen features stone benchtops, butlers pantry, stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, island bench and ample cupboard space. The oversize living zone adjoins the meals area and overlooks the outdoor entertaining zone.
Extra features include floorboards throughout, quality light furnishings, gas fireplace, ducted heating, 2 split systems, day and night Holland blinds, alarm system, an abundance of storage space and so much more.
Situated only moments away from multiple schools, childcare centres, shopping centres, parklands and easy access to all main roads.

Description:
Picture yourself here!
Set in a quiet court location this impressive family home offers a unique lifestyle that's situated in a central Craigieburn location in the heart of everything.
Offering 3 bedrooms, Master with full ensuite and WIR and 2 others all with BIRs. A modern kitchen with S/S appliances that overlooks the spacious meals and separate lounge room.
Set on a massive 645m2 approx. of prime land its many features include ducted heating, split cooling, an under house workshop/ man cave ideal for those wanting to work from home in a private environment.
Ideal for young families, 1st homebuyers, investors or those with specific needs and would like to set up the property with garages and sheds as required.
Close to Craigieburn's shopping complexes, the train station, golf course, leisure aquatic centre and a variety of schools makes this home one not to let slip.
Offers now invited

Description:
Impeccable Style with Position Perfection!
Spacious, versatile & bathed in natural light, this feature-packed home presents a ready-made family lifestyle opportunity enjoying all the convenience of its popular & whisper quiet Mt. Ridley location.
The clean & very flexible floorplan comprises 3 great size rooms with built-in robes, master with full ensuite & walk-in robe, fully equipped hostess kitchen with ample cupboard & bench space & quality stainless steel appliances, sun-drenched open plan living & meals area which will be sublime for all those large-scale family gatherings.
Freeing up your time & all the hassle out of the weekend gardening, the home comes equipped with low maintenance front garden, expansive open space out the back for kids to play, covered outdoor gazebo, garden storage shed & features ducted heating, powerful 7kw split system cooling, high ceilings, granite tiling to all wet areas, single garage with internal & drive-thru access, sparkling central bathroom, roomy laundry & much much more! Neat, sweet & complete, check this out before it's too late!
Located in a quiet & well-presented street, close to public transport, schools, parklands, Highlands shopping centre & Craigieburn Central.
* Auction held at Highgate Recreation Reserve- 229 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn

Description:
Low Maintenance Living in the Heart of Craigieburn
More than meets the eye, this home is set to impress with its low maintenance living & instant access to all Craigieburn amenities. Whether you're a first home buyer, looking to downsize or add to your investment portfolio this is a MUST SEE!
Beyond its modern facade, this home offers 3 good size bedrooms (master with walk-in robe & ensuite), central bathroom with spa, well appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, adjoining meals & family room leading out to a great decked entertaining area.
Further features include, remote garage with internal access, evaporative cooling, heating, solar panels & much more.
Perfectly located close to Newbury Primary School, Pelican Childcare, sporting facilities, Highlands Shopping Centre, Golden Sun Moth Park & public transport. An opportunity not to be missed. Call now!
* Auction held at Highgate Recreation Reserve- 229 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn
